title: Huawei Mate 10 Pro
description: The Huawei Mate 10, Huawei Mate 10 Pro and Huawei Mate 10 Lite are Android smartphones designed and marketed by Huawei as part of the Huawei Mate series. There is also a Mate 10 Porsche design, which has 256Gb of storage but is otherwise identical to the Mate 10 Pro. They were first released on 16 October 2017.[1][2] Versus the predecessor Mate 9
